author: quinton-ashley
description: Get a list of the apps the user has open.
name: get-open-apps

scripts.first: git add -A && git commit -m "First commit" && curl -u $npm_package_author https://api.github.com/$npm_package_author/$npm_package_name -d '{"name":$npm_package_name,"description":$npm_package_description}' && git remote add origin $npm_package_repository_url && git push -U origin master
scripts.postversion: git remote | xargs -L1 git push --all && git push --tags && npm publish
